use.flag: Enables the free open media sets: OpenGFX, OpenSFX, OpenMSX, removing the requirement for proprietary TTD assets to play OpenTTD.
Enables LZO compression for savegames. This is only needed to load extremely old savegames. (versions before 0.2)
Enables midi music in game, using timidity++ as an external player.
Enables midi music in game, using aplaymidi as an external player. (NOTE: this is for users with midi hardware.)
